summary: Completed comprehensive testing of User Management UI in Admin Dashboard after refactoring. All 18 backend API tests passed and all frontend UI features verified working correctly.

issues: Missing data-testid attributes on interactive elements (search input, filter buttons, user rows, modal buttons) - recommended for better test automation

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/admin/users requires authentication (403 without token)
Backend: GET /api/admin/users returns paginated user list with correct structure
Backend: GET /api/admin/users supports pagination (page, limit params)
Backend: GET /api/admin/users supports search filter
Backend: GET /api/admin/users supports is_admin filter
Backend: GET /api/admin/users supports is_banned filter
Backend: GET /api/admin/users/stats/overview requires authentication
Backend: GET /api/admin/users/stats/overview returns user statistics
Backend: POST /api/admin/users/{id}/ban bans a user
Backend: POST /api/admin/users/{id}/unban unbans a user
Backend: Cannot ban yourself (400 error)
Backend: POST /api/admin/users/{id}/make-admin makes user an admin
Backend: POST /api/admin/users/{id}/remove-admin removes admin status
Backend: Cannot remove your own admin status (400 error)
Backend: Cannot make a banned user an admin (400 error)
Backend: DELETE /api/admin/users/{id} deletes a user
Backend: Cannot delete yourself (400 error)
Backend: Cannot delete an admin user (400 error)
Frontend: Admin login flow via /profile page works correctly
Frontend: Admin Dashboard button visible on profile page for admin users
Frontend: Navigation to Admin Dashboard works
Frontend: Users tab displays correctly with 6 tabs (Games, GamePix, Upload, Users, Analytics, Settings)
Frontend: User stats cards display (Total Users: 7, Active 24h: 0, New Today: 0, Banned: 0)
Frontend: User search functionality works
Frontend: User filter buttons (All, Admins, Banned) work correctly
Frontend: User list displays with username, email, games played, join date
Frontend: ADMIN badge displays for admin users
Frontend: BANNED badge displays for banned users
Frontend: User detail modal opens on click
Frontend: Modal shows Games Played, Total Play Time, Joined, Last Active
Frontend: Ban User button works and shows success toast
Frontend: Unban User button works and shows success toast
Frontend: Make Admin button visible for non-admin users
Frontend: Remove Admin button visible for admin users
Frontend: Delete User button visible (disabled for admin users)
Frontend: Close button closes modal
action_items: OPTIONAL: Add data-testid attributes to UsersTab component for better test automation (search input, filter buttons, user rows, modal buttons)
critical_code_review_comments: UsersTab component is well-structured with proper TypeScript interfaces
All user management APIs properly enforce admin authentication
Ban/Unban/Make Admin/Remove Admin/Delete operations have proper validation (cannot self-ban, cannot delete admin, etc.)
User stats overview provides comprehensive metrics (total users, active 24h, new today, banned count)
Pagination is implemented but only shows when totalPages > 1
Modal properly handles loading states during actions
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_user_* test users during backend testing (automatically cleaned up). Used existing testuser_* accounts for UI testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: User Management UI fully tested after refactoring. All features working: 1) Admin login via /profile page. 2) Admin Dashboard navigation. 3) Users tab with stats cards (Total Users, Active 24h, New Today, Banned). 4) Search by username/email. 5) Filter by All/Admins/Banned. 6) User list with ADMIN/BANNED badges. 7) User detail modal with Games Played, Total Play Time, Joined, Last Active. 8) Ban/Unban/Make Admin/Remove Admin/Delete actions all working with proper validation. 9) Pagination implemented (shows when >10 users). Backend APIs at /api/admin/users/* all working correctly.
